StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateROTCUsingGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ROTCID uniqueiden..er, @PointOfContactID uniqueiden..er, @SchoolCode uniqueiden..er, @FiscalYear int, @Service varchar(3), @Popula.on smallint, @CollegePro.leID uniqueiden..er, @RankCode varchar(10), @UserLogin varchar(50)
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DECLARE @SchoolCodeint int
BEGIN TRANSACTION
Select @SchoolCodeint = School_Code FROM High_School hs where hs.rowguid = @SchoolCode
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].[CollegePro.le] where CollegePro.leID = @CollegePro.leID and @CollegePro.leID IS NOT NULL)
BEGIN INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] ([CollegePro.leID],[SCHOOL_CODE], [FiscalYear], [UserLogin], [UpdateDate]) VALUES (@CollegePro.leID,@SchoolCodeint,@FiscalYear, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END
-- informa.on for an exisi.ng record can be inserted. IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.leROTC] where CollegePro.leROTCID = @ROTCID and @ROTCID IS NOT NULL)
-- then update the exisi.ng record BEGIN
UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.leROTC]
SET [Service] = @Service, [Popula.on] = @Popula.on, [RankCode] = @RankCode, [UserLogin] = @UserLogin, [CollegePro.leID] = @CollegePro.leID, [UpdateDate] = GetDate()
WHERE CollegePro.leROTCID = @ROTCID
END -- If exists in College Pro.le ROTC ELSE BEGIN --insert into college pro.le ROTC INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.leROTC] ([CollegePro.leROTCID],[Service],[Popula.on],[PointOfContactID] ,[RankCode],[CollegePro.leID],[UserLogin] ,[UpdateDate]) VALUES (@ROTCID, @Service, @Popula.on, @PointOfContactID, @RankCode, @CollegePro.leID,@UserLogin,GetDate()) END -- end insert college pro.le rotc
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
COMMIT TRANSACTION
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
